sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Text,
  Flex,
  Accordion,
  Center,
  Badge,
  Checkbox,
  Image,
  Card,
} from "@mantine/core";

const CategoryWithProduct = ({
  setBoxVisible,
  boxVisible,
  setBoxVisible2,
  boxVisible2,
  title,
  title2,
  setCategoryVisible,
  setCategoryVisible2,
  setCategoryVisible3,
  setCategoryVisible4,
}) => {
  const [iconCheckVisible, setIconCheckVisible] = useState(false);
  const [iconCheckVisible2, setIconCheckVisible2] = useState(false);
  const handleCategoryWithProductClick = () => {
    setBoxVisible(!boxVisible);
    setBoxVisible2(false);
    setIconCheckVisible(!iconCheckVisible);
    setIconCheckVisible2(false);
    setCategoryVisible(false);
    setCategoryVisible2(false);
    setCategoryVisible3(false);
    setCategoryVisible4(false);
  };
  const handleCategoryWithProductClick2 = () => {
    setBoxVisible2(!boxVisible2);
    setBoxVisible(false);
    setIconCheckVisible2(!iconCheckVisible2);
    setIconCheckVisible(false);
    setCategoryVisible(false);
    setCategoryVisible2(false);
    setCategoryVisible3(false);
    setCategoryVisible4(false);
  };
  return (
    <Accordion.Item value="category-with-product">
      <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
        <Center>
          <Text fw={700}>Category With Product</Text>
        </Center>
      </Accordion.Control>
      <Accordion.Panel>
        <Box
          bg="gray.2"
          style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}
          onClick={handleCategoryWithProductClick}
        >
          <Flex
            justify="space-between"
            align="center"
            direction="row"
            wrap="wrap"
          >
            <Text ml="xs">{title}</Text>
            {iconCheckVisible && (
              <Flex mr="xs" h={{ base: "auto", md: `100%` }}>
                <Checkbox defaultChecked />
              </Flex>
            )}
          </Flex>
          <Flex
            h="auto"
            pb={10}
            justify="flex-start"
            align="center"
            direction="row"
            wrap="wrap"
          >
            <Card
              ml="xs"
              mt
              shadow="sm"
              padding="xs"
              radius="md"
              w={{ base: "100%", md: 90 }}
            >
              <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                On Sale
              </Badge>
              <Card.Section>
                <Image
                  ml="xs"
                  mr="xs"
                  radius="md"
                  h={100}
                  w={70}
                  fit="contain"
                  src="https://johnlewis.scene7.com/is/image/JohnLewis/laptop-carousel1-010323"
                />
              </Card.Section>
              <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
              <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
            </Card>
            <Card
              ml="xs"
              shadow="sm"
              padding="xs"
              radius="md"
              w={{ base: "100%", md: 90 }}
            >
              <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                On Sale
              </Badge>
              <Card.Section>
                <Image
                  ml="xs"
                  mr="xs"
                  radius="md"
                  h={100}
                  w={70}
                  fit="contain"
                  src="https://johnlewis.scene7.com/is/image/JohnLewis/laptop-carousel1-010323"
                />
              </Card.Section>
              <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
              <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
            </Card>
            <Card
              ml="xs"
              shadow="sm"
              padding="xs"
              radius="md"
              w={{ base: "100%", md: 90 }}
            >
              <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                On Sale
              </Badge>
              <Card.Section>
                <Image
                  ml="xs"
                  mr="xs"
                  radius="md"
                  h={100}
                  w={70}
                  fit="contain"
                  src="https://johnlewis.scene7.com/is/image/JohnLewis/laptop-carousel1-010323"
                />
              </Card.Section>
              <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
              <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
            </Card>
          </Flex>
        </Box>

        <Box
          bg="gray.2"
          mt="xs"
          style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}
          onClick={handleCategoryWithProductClick2}
        >
          <Flex justify="space-between" align="center" direction="row">
            <Text ml="xs">{title2}</Text>
            {iconCheckVisible2 && (
              <Flex mr="xs" h={{ base: "auto", md: `100%` }}>
                <Checkbox defaultChecked />
              </Flex>
            )}
          </Flex>
          <Flex
            h={440}
            gap="2px"
            justify="flex-start"
            align="center"
            direction="row"
            wrap="wrap"
          >
            <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={145}>
              <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                On Sale
              </Badge>
              <Card.Section>
                <Image
                  radius="md"
                  ml="xs"
                  h={100}
                  w="auto"
                  fit="contain"
                  src="https://johnlewis.scene7.com/is/image/JohnLewis/laptop-carousel1-010323"
                  alt="Norway"
                />
              </Card.Section>
              <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
              <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
            </Card>
            <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={145}>
              <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                On Sale
              </Badge>
              <Card.Section>
                <Image
                  ml="xs"
                  mr="xs"
                  radius="md"
                  h={100}
                  w="auto"
                  fit="contain"
                  src="https://sonysmart.com.bd/public/uploads/all/wmAR0iWAr5pRubmvbCtS0bXtrzqhpTCD2nUxSaDN.jpg"
                  alt="Norway"
                />
              </Card.Section>
              <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
              <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
            </Card>
            <Card ml="xs" mt="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={145}>
              <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                On Sale
              </Badge>
              <Card.Section>
                <Image
                  ml="xs"
                  mr="xs"
                  radius="md"
                  h={100}
                  w="auto"
                  fit="contain"
                  src="https://images.macrumors.com/t/RnswrVxVO5LlEOaPBJfTaCue5iU=/1200x1200/smart/article-new/2023/02/airpods-pro-2-red-pink.jpg"
                  alt="Norway"
                />
              </Card.Section>
              <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
              <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
            </Card>
            <Card ml="xs" mt="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={145}>
              <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                On Sale
              </Badge>
              <Card.Section>
                <Image
                  ml="xs"
                  mr="xs"
                  radius="md"
                  h={100}
                  w="auto"
                  fit="contain"
                  src="https://images.macrumors.com/t/RnswrVxVO5LlEOaPBJfTaCue5iU=/1200x1200/smart/article-new/2023/02/airpods-pro-2-red-pink.jpg"
                  alt="Norway"
                />
              </Card.Section>
              <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
              <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
            </Card>
          </Flex>
        </Box>
      </Accordion.Panel>
    </Accordion.Item>
  );
};

export default CategoryWithProduct;
